projects.name: Okuro
projects.description: Web page and mobile app designed to use a single system for students in my high school, with their online classes, live classes, and task delivery.
bullets: Built a web page using node.js, MySQL, Javascript, and bootstrap in both backend and frontend, integrating API REST, real-time communication, and video streaming with the help of expressJS etc.
Worked with Java to build an Android App for the same purpose as the web page but focusing on portability, migrating all functionalities from web page to mobile app

projects.name: RemiCDMX
projects.description: Desktop application for taking control of immigrants around Mexico City, capturing their pictures, and storing all their data; we give them a ticket for a great and controlled stay in Mexico City.
bullets: Built an application using Java Swing and Java Object-Oriented Programming.
Used of Ireport for the expedition of tickets and libraries to use camera hardware in Java.

projects.name: Blogi
projects.description: Web application to share my projects and some relevant news in the world.
bullets: Build a web app with Django Framework in order to use all the enviroment and pattern design (Model-View-Template) proposed by Django
Used of django templates helped with html and css.
Used of django ORM with MySQL persist information.

projects.name: Canal 11
projects.description: Web application to emulate the schedule and programs details from the Canal 11 TV channel.
bullets: Build a web application using python and Flask framework.
Used of flask templates helped by html, and tailwind css to stilize and structure the project.
Used of MySQL database to persist information and PyMySQL to connect with Python.

projects.name: Asteroids
projects.description: Mobile application to play the famous game Asteroids, move and shot missiles to destroy all the asteroids, be careful an incoming asteroid can destroy you.
bullets: Build a mobile application using Java with Android Studio to develop this Android Game.
Used of XML and material UI to design layouts and stilize the project.
Used of sqlite to persist user putuation and save user preferences.

projects.name: My Places
projects.description: Mobile Aplication to save all the information of your favorite places, this application will tell you if you are near of any place.
bullets: Build a mobile application using Java with Android Studio and google maps api.
Used of XML and material UI to design layouts and stilize the project.
Used of sqlite to persist user places and the respective information.
Used of google maps api to check near places.

projects.name: Peluqueria X-treme
projects.description: A web application that allows to clients select services and stylist to make their appointment at the hairdresser salon. Hairdresser admin will administrate these appointments.
bullets: Build a web application using Java JSP's and servlets.
Used of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Ajax.
Used of MySQL in a relational database to make all the business logical.
